title: Research Grounding: Claim Selection
promptTemplate:
Use only the source snippets below. Choose the best-supported claim and output exactly: CLAIM:<A|B|C>|SOURCES:S1,S2,S3

S1: Randomized pilot (n=120) shows error rate dropped from 10% to 7%.
S2: Retrospective study (n=400) found no statistically significant change.
S3: Preregistered replication (n=150) shows error rate dropped from 11% to 8%.

Claims:
A) The intervention increases error rates.
B) The intervention likely yields a modest reduction, but evidence is mixed.
C) The intervention eliminates errors entirely.

title: Research Grounding: Weighted Effect Estimate
promptTemplate:
Use only the trial data below. Compute the weighted average effect size and output exactly: EFFECT:<value>%|SOURCES:S1,S2,S3

S1: n=50, effect=10%
S2: n=100, effect=5%
S3: n=50, effect=4%
